A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Disney has done a great job of completely dismantling what I consider the centerpiece of my childhood. Politically correct themes\, unnecessary and out of place humor\, the neutering of Luke Skywalker and the overall \"Disneyfication\" of the new Star Wars leaves me saddened\, angry and desperately hoping a complete 180 degree shift will occur with the next movie lest my greatest cinematic love be forever lost and in absolute ruin.
